abilities.name: Battlefield first aid
abilities.effect: 1AP, Once per battle: Heal 1D3 +1 wounds to a friendly operative within Control Range. Can only be used if there are no enemy operatives within 3 inches of this operative or the target.

abilities.name: Extended Mags
abilities.effect: Place an ammunition box marker within Control Range. Whenever a friendly operative performs a Shoot action within Control Range of the ammunition box marker, they add one attack dice but cannot retain critical successes from it.

abilities.name: Steady Guard
abilities.effect: Reaction, Once per battle: When an enemy operative ends an action in which it moved, you can make a shoot action against that operative if it's a valid target.

abilities.name: Mist Veil
abilities.effect: 1AP, Once per battle, Psychic: This operative is treated as in Cover until the end of its next activation. Enemy operatives more than 12 inches away also treat it as Obscured.

abilities.name: The Windâ€™s Gift
abilities.effect: Once per battle, Psychic: This operative suffers 1 wound to restore 2D3 +1 wounds to another friendly operative within 6 inches, cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy.

abilities.name: Wind's Gift Salvation
abilities.effect: Reaction, Once per Battle: When a shoot or fight action is declared against a friendly operative, you can perform a Wind's Gift on that operative (you must comply it's conditions, this does not count towards usage of Wind's Gift usage limit.

abilities.name: Unrelenting Agility
abilities.effect: Once per battle: this operative may perform Shoot action within control range of an enemy operative if that same operative was the target of previous charge action during this activation. If the target survives, this operative gains 1AP until the end of the activation.

abilities.name: Quick Assault
abilities.effect: Once per battle: if this operative hasn't done a shoot action during this activation and performed a charge action, it can resolve two dice in sequence and add 1dmg to both their damage.

abilities.name: Deadly intuition
abilities.effect: Reaction, Once per battle: When an enemy operative declares a charge action, before or after it moves, if it's a valid target you can make a shoot action against that operative, weapons used for this rule gain the balanced weapon rule.

abilities.name: Fractal Visions
abilities.effect: Once per Battle, Psychic: Reroll a failed shooting attack dice.

abilities.name: Mist Veilwalk
abilities.effect: 1AP, Psychic: Teleport 6 inches through mist zones. Roll 1D6; on a 4+, change order to conceal.

abilities.name: Screaming Vortex
abilities.effect: 1AP, Psychic: Once per Battle. Summon one of your deployables within control range.

abilities.name: Heretic Astartes
abilities.effect: Once per battle: This operative gains 1AP and it can perform either two Shoot actions or two Fight actions. You cannot select the same psychic ranged weapon more than once. For the rest of the battle it can counteract regarless of order.

abilities.name: Temporal Protection
abilities.effect: Reaction, Once per battle: When an enemy operative declares a fight or shoot action against you or allies withint 6 inches, you can Summon your Screecher Blue deployable, (this does not count towards Screaming Vortex usage limit, but you cannot summon Screecher Blue when using it).

abilities.name: Mist Regeneration
abilities.effect: At the start of activation, Psychic, if in a mist zone, roll 1D6 on a 4+ and heal wounds based on mist density: Light Mist (1 wound), Medium Mist (1D3 wounds), Dense Mist (2D3 wounds).

abilities.name: Boulder Roll
abilities.effect: 1AP: Move up to 6 inches in a straight line. Operatives within 1 inch of the path (180 degrees arc) suffer 1D3 wounds.

abilities.name: Primal Retaliation
abilities.effect: Reaction, Once per battle: When you survive a retaliation, you can declare a fight action against the operative that you just fought.

abilities.name: Fortify
abilities.effect: 1AP: Place one of your deployables visible and within 3 inches. Max 2 per game.

abilities.name: Rites of Repair
abilities.effect: 1AP: Restore 1D3 wounds to a construct.

abilities.name: Techmarine Astartes
abilities.effect: Once per battle: This operative gains 1AP and it can perform either two Shoot actions, two Fight actions or two Fortity actions. You must select at least one PISTOL weapon to perform two shoot actions this way. For the rest of the battle it can counteract regarless of order.

abilities.name: Genius Placement
abilities.effect: Reaction, Once per battle: When an enemy operative declares a fight or shoot action against you or allies within 3 inches, you can summon 1 of your light barricade deployables (place it so ally is in cover) or make a shoot action against that enemy operative with one of your Autogun Turret deployables.
